sources.title: Night Alarm
sources.description: You can find more information regarding this film on its IMDb page .

sources.title: Night Alarm (1934) BRUCE CABOT
sources.description:
Stars: Bruce Cabot, Judith Allen, H.B. Warner 
 Director: Spencer Gordon Bennet

 A reporter itching to get off the boring gardening "beat" gets a chance to investigate a series of arson fires. He believes the fires are tied into a web of political corruption involving a wealthy businessman, the mayor and the police chief. Complications ensue when the girl assigned to help him turns out to be the businessman's daughter!

metadata.Plot: A reporter itching to get off the boring gardening "beat" gets a chance to investigate a series of arson fires that have been plaguing the city. He believes the fires are tied into a web of political corruption involving a wealthy businessman, the mayor and the police chief. Complicatins ensue when the girl assigned to help him turns out to be the businessman's daughter.
metadata.Actors: Bruce Cabot, Judith Allen, H.B. Warner
